description:
Despite putting a halt on the “Marvel’s Agents of SHIELD” spinoff, which was proposed earlier this year, ABC is closing in on a deal to order a pilot for a project centered around Mockingbird, Variety has learned exclusively.尽管漫威的《神盾局特工》衍生篇被叫暂停了，这是今年早些时候那么打算的。ABC快达成一个协议，制定一个关于仿生鸟为主题的试播集，我们也了解了一些独家的资讯。

Titled “Marvel’s Most Wanted,” the drama will focus on popular “SHIELD” characters Adrianne Palicki‘s Bobbi Morse (also known as Mockingbird) and Nick Blood’s Lance Hunter. The two actors will topline the pilot and prospective series.该剧定名为《漫威最高通缉》，该剧会关注很著名的《神盾局》角色由阿德琳妮·帕里奇饰演的芭比·莫尔斯，也被熟知为仿生鸟还有尼克·布勒德饰演的劳伦斯·亨特。这俩位会是试播集和未来剧集的主演。

“SHIELD” producers Jeffrey Bell and Paul Zbyszewski co-created the project for Marvel and ABC Studios, co-writing the pilot. They will serve as showrunners and exec producers together with Marvel’s head of television Jeph Loeb also exec producing.《神盾局 》的制作人杰夫瑞和保罗为漫威和ABC工作室共同提出了这个计划，共同执笔了试播集。他们一起会作为制作人和实际制片人，漫威电视部负责人杰夫也会参与制作。

Insiders say the series is not a spinoff, per se, but rather an entirely new project solely focused on the two characters to continue their story. Though plot details are scarce at this point, “Marvel’s Most Wanted” will follow the pair and their adventures together.内部消息说这系列本质上不是一个衍生剧，更像是一个只关注这2个角色的新剧，让他们延续他们的故事。尽管那么看来我们还不能得知剧情的细节，但是漫威的这部《最高通缉》会继续主要讲述这两个人以及他们的冒险故事。

At this time, ABC has not made any decisions regarding premiere date or a path of introduction, such as introducing the new show as a planted episode during “SHIELD.”与此同时，ABC并没有决定这部剧的首播时间或是简介，就像是把这部新剧当做是《神盾局》某个确定的一集来介绍。

An “Agents of SHIELD” offshoot was originally reported in April, but was soonafter shot down with the network deciding not to move forward. However, during New York Upfronts this spring, ABC president Paul Lee alluded to the possibility of the series being resurrected, teasing, “It certainly is a possibility of spinning them off.”四月有原创报道说会有《神盾局特工》的衍生剧，但是很快由于网络取消了这个计划并决定不再继续。但是由于今年春天的“纽约前沿”，ABC主席保罗·李有暗示了这部剧复活的可能性。“是一部衍生剧真的只是一种可能”。

Lee added that “SHIELD” had hit its creative strive, suggesting that the net didnt want to mess around with a formula that was working — which includes Palicki and Blood’s storylines. “We absolutely love those characters on ‘SHIELD,'” he said, at the time.李还说《神盾局》在有创造性的努力着，建议这部剧的关系网并不要因此变得很乱，会遵循着它现在的方式，当然包括仿生鸟和保罗的故事线。“我们绝对喜欢这些《神盾局》里的角色”他同时说。

But with “SHIELD” coming back for Season 3, in addition to “Agent Carter” returning for Season 2, there’s still a large Marvel appetite at ABC. Also in the works at the network, is a top-secret Marvel project helmed by “American Crime” creator John Ridley.但是《神盾局》即将回归第三季，同时《特工卡特》也会迎来第二季。ABC对漫威还是抱有很大希望的。在广播网的作品中，还有一部《美国罪恶》主创约翰创造的机密漫威计划。
